series_description: This series documents the condition of VDOT buildings that more than 500 square feet or more than $5,000 in value. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents annual building safety inspections to identify and remove any safety or fire hazards. This series include, but is not limited to: reports and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents site inspections of fresh water wells on district property, rest areas, VDOT area headquarters and residencies. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports and supporting documentation.
This series documents the identification and closure of wells located on district property. This series may include, but not limited to: reports and supporting documentation.
This series documents the design, planning, and history of interior renovation work for VDOT buildings. This series may include, but is not limited to: plans and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 1 Year after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents the destruction of lead and asbestos material removed from VDOT/Capital Outlay buildings. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports, specifications, forms, and checklists.

This series documents any human exposure to lead and/or asbestos materials in a VDOT-owned building, as well as the agency's response. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports, specifications, forms, and checklists.

This series documents building inspections conducted to determine the presence of asbestos or lead-based paint materials used to initiate abatement projects. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, reports, and forms.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents approvals for live line work on or equipment in the districts that have specific lockout/tagout procedures verifying that workers have been trained, acquired approval, and will follow specific procedures to lockout hazardous energy while working on electrical equipment. This series may include, but is not limited to: checklists and forms.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents long-term planning, construction, and renovations for VDOT facilities statewide. This series may include, but is not limited to: studies and recommendations.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the permits required by the Dept. of General Services for VDOT to demolish existing buildings. series may include, but is not limited to: permits and documentation.
retention_statement: 5 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents the request, approval, design, and construction of new buildings and renovations for existing buildings at VDOT locations. This series may include, but is limited to: requests, approvals, indexes, and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 2 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents the identification and closure of surface water discharge drains located on district property. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports and supporting documentation.
This series documents laboratory test results on district wastewater entering the county sewer system. This series may include, but is not limited to: worksheets, reports, and forms.
